text:
This is a place where individuals and multitudes gather to pray, give thanks and pour out their hearts to the LORD.

The cathedral is built in 1847. It has a rich history and survived the invasion by the Japanese during World War II.

Services are held weekly. The place is always packed on Good Friday, Easter Sunday and Christmas seasons.

Please spend some time to kneel and pray at this place if you have not visited this Cathedral before.

Nice kindergarten with friendly staff. There are morning and evening mass in the chapel. There are also a lot of activities and events for different ages. Has one of the most safest and child-oriented girls' home. The children are really friendly and mature.
We have sinhala mass for all Sri lankans . Every Sunday 12:30 pm
There is a sinhala roman catholic mass in there Sunday 12.00PM. More sinhala people come there.
Nifty place with tech around. Great for luncheons and perhaps a walk behind the cascading garden.
